mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MemberKeyword SELECT m.id as FK_Member, k.id as FK_SearchKeywordModel FROM Member as m, SearchKeywordModel as k WHERE email = #{email} and keyword = #{keyword}
mapper.select: SELECT sk.keyword FROM MemberKeyword as mk INNER JOIN Member as m ON mk.FK_Member = m.id INNER JOIN SearchKeywordModel as sk ON sk.id = mk.FK_SearchKeywordModel WHERE m.email = #{email}
